name: Parkhourse
description:
Chula is an old horse, but she's no dummy. When she woke up in a new stall on a strange farm she knew something was up. Then the glue truck came and she knew it was now or never. You either lay down and die or you PARKHOURSE!

Join Chula as she tries to escape her fate. Collect carrots and sugar cubes as you run through this insane world that I concocted entirely within one month for the 2016 Videogamely Game Jam!

Will you become the unicorn you've always dreamed of? Or will you just be another bottle of glue on the shelf?

UPDATE 1: Version 1.1 released. Fixes a few issues with the in-game stats not resetting after a game over or a finished playthrough.
